name: Poha
description: Flattened rice sautéed with onions, mustard seeds, turmeric, and peanuts. Light, tasty, and nutritious.

name: Upma
description: A savory dish made with semolina, vegetables, and tempering spices. Served hot with coconut chutney.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy fermented rice crepe filled with spicy mashed potatoes, served with sambar and chutney.

name: Aloo Paratha
description: Stuffed flatbread with spicy mashed potatoes, served hot with butter, curd, or pickle.

name: Sabudana Khichdi
description: Soaked tapioca pearls sautéed with peanuts, potatoes, and green chili. A popular breakfast during fasts.

name: Bread Omelette
description: Toasted bread with a fluffy omelette filled with onions, chilies, and fresh herbs.

name: Puran Poli
description: Sweet stuffed flatbread made with jaggery and chana dal, perfect for a festive morning.

name: Vegetable Sandwich
description: Fresh sandwich with layers of cucumber, tomato, onion, and mint chutney between grilled bread.
